name: Tongue In Cheek
description:
Open wide and say “AAAAAAAHAHAHAHA!” 

Help Chip and his toothy brothers and sisters survive the entire visit during your tri-annual trip to Dr. Rinsinspit’s office in this fast paced and hilarious Survival Arena Platformer! You and up to15 of your set must avoid the demented dentist’s tools as you bounce and dodge your way to safety! Have you been flossing regularly?

Gamers of all ages can sink their teeth into this fun and frantic adventure!

Programmer---Liza Knipscher https://knipsch.com/ 

Programmer--Cassie Todd 

Pixel Art/Animations/Art Direction -- Cheryl https://twitter.com/OddCreampuff https://globalgamejam.org/users/odd-creampuff 

UI/UX/Project manager--Chinami Michaels Chinamimichaels.com 

Writing/Project Manager/Audio SFX-- Bob 

Music -- FelixSickTricks 

Game Designer -- Greta
